review_title: Great place to work while in school
job_title: Student Life Worker in Fennimore, WI
pros:
- They work with your class schedule
- You can work as many (up to 29hrs/wk) or as little amount of hours you want
- Super friendly coworkers
- Surprisingly large budget to work with on projects
cons: It’s a federal law, but student workers are only allowed to work 29 hours a week at most. Even during the summer. Wish that was different.

pros: Plenty of work to keep you busy
cons:
Asked to do the work of 2-3 full-time employees depending on the day
Pay is substandard 
Constantly reducing benefits - insurance premiums increase, but pay doesn't
